title: If you're remote, ramble
author: lawgimenez
aiHeadline: If you're remote, ramble: A heartfelt ode to the art of procrastination, where every meeting is a productivity coma and every email chain is a existential crisis.

title: Modern Node.js Patterns
author: eustoria
aiHeadline: Modern Node.js Patterns: Because nothing says 'cutting-edge' like rewriting the same code every six months to keep up with the ever-changing Zeitgeist of JavaScript.

title: Twenty Eighth International Obfuscated C Code Contest
author: mdl_principle
aiHeadline: Twenty Eighth International Obfuscated C Code Contest: Where programmers prove that writing code no one can understand is still a thing, and the only thing more impressive than the code is the creativity in making it incomprehensible.

title: Persona vectors: Monitoring and controlling character traits in language models
author: itchyjunk
aiHeadline: Persona vectors: Monitoring and controlling character traits in language models: Because nothing says 'AI ethics' like creating algorithms that can micromanage your personality, one vector at a time.

title: UN report finds UN reports are not widely read
author: anjneymidha
aiHeadline: UN report finds UN reports are not widely read: A groundbreaking revelation that somehow manages to be both unsurprising and deeply concerning, proving that even the UN can't escape the irony of its own irrelevance.
